## `SetWatermark`

Sets the watermark drawn on graphs for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetWatermark(string watermark)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` watermark | The string to write across graphs. |
:::
